# pc_out				4 hex 
# exec_op.aluop			string
# exec_op.alusrc1		1 bin
# exec_op.alusrc2		1 bin
# exec_op.alusrc3		1 bin 
# exec_op.rs1			5 bin
# exec_op.rs2			5 bin
# exec_op.readdata1		8 hex
# exec_op.readdata2		8 hex
# exec_op.imm			8 hex
# mem_op.branch 		string
# mem_op.mem.mem_read 	1 bin
# mem_op.mem.mem_write 	1 bin
# mem_op.mem.memtype 	string
# wb_op.rd 				5 bin
# wb_op.write 			1 bin
# wb_op.src 			string
# exec_dec 				1 bin


#### R-type instructions ###

# ADD
0000
ALU_ADD
0
0
0
00001
00010
00000001
00000002
00000000
BR_NOP
0
0
MEM_W
00011
1
WBS_ALU
0

0004

0
0
0
00010
00001

00000001

0

WBS_ALU
0
